name: Do NOT Feed This Plant!!
description:
Do NOT feed this plant. 
Do NOT take the specimen out of the lab and plant it in your garden. 

Do NOT press left or right to aim. 
Do NOT press W or UP to eat. 
Do NOT eat flies to get bigger. 
Specimen is afraid of Bees. 
Do NOT try to get as big as possible before time runs out. 
And for the love of god, DO NOT FEED THIS PLANT!!

100% ORGANIC
100% HANDMADE ASSETS
DO press ESC to view the credits.

Part of the 2023 Global Game Jam.
https://globalgamejam.org/2023/games/project-venus-8
